example.eg: Enumeration of all the visible stars would take a very long time.
The enumeration looks incomplete; please check it again.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 列举, 详表, 细目

example.eg: Sally's enumeration of the items was correct.
His report contained nothing superfluous: it was just an enumeration of facts.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 列举事实, 罗列数据
